Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers

Class TracerWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers.TracerWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TracerI, WindowFocusListener, WindowListener, WindowStateListener, EventListener
    public class TracerWindow
extends WindowAdapter
implements WindowListener, TracerI
    The class TracerWindow implements a simple tracer for BCM printing trace messages in a window.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2018-08-30

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      create a tracer with the given parameters.

      • TracerWindow

        public TracerWindow()
        create a tracer with default parameters.

        Contract

         pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   !this.isTracing()
 post   !this.isSuspended()

      • TracerWindow

        public TracerWindow​(String title,
                    int xRelativePos,
                    int yRelativePos)
        create a tracer with the given parameters.

        Contract

         pre    xRelativePos >= 0
 pre    yRelativePos >= 0
 post   !this.isTracing()
 post   !this.isSuspended()
        Parameters:
        title - title to put on the frame.
        xRelativePos - x position of the frame in the group of frames.
        yRelativePos - x position of the frame in the group of frames.

      • TracerWindow

        public TracerWindow​(String title,
                    int xOrigin,
                    int yOrigin,
                    int frameWidth,
                    int frameHeight,
                    int xRelativePos,
                    int yRelativePos)
        create a tracer with the given parameters.

        Contract

         pre    xOrigin >= 0
 pre    xOrigin < this.getScreenWidth()
 pre    yOrigin >= 0
 pre    yOrigin < this.getScreenHeight()
 pre    frameWidth > 0
 pre    frameHeight > 0
 pre    xRelativePos >= 0
 pre    yRelativePos >= 0
 post   !this.isTracing()
 post   !this.isSuspended()
        Parameters:
        title - title to put on the frame.
        xOrigin - x origin in screen unit.
        yOrigin - y origin in screen unit.
        frameWidth - width of the tracer frame.
        frameHeight - height of the tracer frame.
        xRelativePos - x position of the frame in the group of frames.
        yRelativePos - x position of the frame in the group of frames.
